Entries.Description: Fix issue in the Lambda publish dialog that would prevent it from showing the list of Lambda functions in an account.
Fix "An update is in progress for resource" failure when publishing NodeJs Lambda functions
If the new "Publish to AWS" experience has a problem starting up, it attempts to enable the older publishing experience.
The Toolkit now shows a message if Credentials are not valid when trying to open the new "Publish to AWS" experience.
Added .NET 6 Lambda container images to the Lambda project blueprints for Visual Studio 2022
The AWS Toolkit for Visual Studio 2022 is now out of Preview.
Add support for configuring Lambda Test Tool for .NET 6 projects

Updated the charts in the Monitoring panel of Beanstalk Environments and CloudFormation stacks. This addresses the "DataVisualization.Charting" error that could happen when trying to view Environments.
Improved the "Publish to AWS" experience for configuring VPCs and IAM Roles. Existing resources can be selected from a dialog.
